name: Court of Bounty
oracle_text:
When Court of Bounty enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you're the monarch, instead you may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: "Anara, Fabulous Familiar"
oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, commanders you control have indestructible.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: "Anara, Fabulous Familiar"
oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, commanders you control have indestructible.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Ancient Animus
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Multani's mind grasped for consciousness as rage itself rebuilt his body.

name: Obeka, Brute Chronologist
oracle_text: {T}: The player whose turn it is may end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

name: Cuombajj Witches
oracle_text: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

name: Cuombajj Witches
oracle_text: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.
flavor_text: All things are connected: light to dark, age to youth, blood to blood.

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

name: Wrong Turn
oracle_text: Target opponent gains control of target creature. (If an attacking or blocking creature changes controllers, it's removed from combat.)

name: Wrong Turn
oracle_text: Target opponent gains control of target creature. (If an attacking or blocking creature changes controllers, it's removed from combat.)
flavor_text: Its bewildered bellow was met with a stern "ssh."

name: Armored Skyhunter
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Armored Skyhunter attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put an Aura or Equipment card from among them onto the battlefield. If an Equipment is put onto the battlefield this way, you may attach it to a creature you control. Put the rest of those cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Staunch Throneguard
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Staunch Throneguard enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"Brago in his arrogance let the throne's defenses fall dormant. Our new queen is not so incautious."
—Livio, Oathsworn Sentinel

name: Bitter Revelation
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Here you lie then, Ugin. The corpses of worlds will join you in the tomb."
—Sorin Markov

name: Perilous Myr
oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

name: Armillary Sphere
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Vow of Wildness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor_text:
"Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath—or wishes it could."
—Karador, Ghost Chieftain

name: Vow of Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor_text:
"Soaring is wasted on the winged."
—Edric, Spymaster of Trest

name: Vow of Lightning
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor_text:
"For all I have lost, for all who have fallen, I will render you to dust."
—Jared Carthalion

name: Vow of Duty
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor_text:
"I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."
—Kaalia of the Vast

name: Armix, Filigree Thrasher
oracle_text:
Whenever Armix, Filigree Thrasher attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, target creature defending player controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control plus the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

oracle_text:
{T}: Choose one. X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.
• Scry X.

• You gain X life.

name: Austere Command
oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

name: Soulfire Eruption
oracle_text: Choose any amount of target creatures, planeswalkers, or players. For each one, exile the top card of your library, then Soulfire Eruption deals damage to that target equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of the your next turn.

name: Ardenn, Intrepid Archaeologist
oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach any number of Auras and Equipment you control to target permanent or player.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor_text: "With the right tools, even the sky is within reach."

name: Flood of Recollection
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.
flavor_text: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.

name: Inspiring Roar
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Intangible Virtue
oracle_text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
flavor_text: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.
